com.pkaleta.todoapp.service

Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl

    public interface UserService
    Author:
    pkaleta Interface of Spring component-service, that allows to operate on db through UserDAO interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteUserById(int id)
      Delete User from db that ID's is equal to param

      Get raw list of all User from db

      Look for User with ID that's equal to param
